gam_data_agent.py.snippet:
usage: gam_data_agent.py [-h] {status,download} ...

GeoAnomalyMapper Unified Data Agent

positional arguments:
  {status,download}
    status           Show dataset status
    download         Download datasets

options:

multi_resolution_fusion.py.snippet:
usage: multi_resolution_fusion.py [-h] [--lon-min LON_MIN] [--lat-min LAT_MIN]
                                  [--lon-max LON_MAX] [--lat-max LAT_MAX]
                                  [--region REGION] [--resolution RESOLUTION]
                                  [--output OUTPUT]
                                  [--sources SOURCES [SOURCES ...]]

Multi-resolution geophysical data fusion pipeline

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit

detect_voids.py.snippet:
usage: detect_voids.py [-h] [--region REGION] [--resolution RESOLUTION]
                       [--output OUTPUT] [--output-dir OUTPUT_DIR]

Detect underground voids using multi-layer geophysical analysis

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --region REGION       Region bounds: "lon_min,lat_min,lon_max,lat_max"
                        (default: Carlsbad Caverns area)
  --resolution RESOLUTION

validate_against_known_features.py.snippet:
usage: validate_against_known_features.py [-h] [--buffer BUFFER]
                                          [--output-dir OUTPUT_DIR]
                                          [--enhanced] [--json-report]
                                          raster

Validate fusion results against known underground features

positional arguments:
  raster                Path to fused anomaly GeoTIFF

setup_environment.py.snippet:
usage: setup_environment.py [-h] {check,setup,requirements} ...

GeoAnomalyMapper Environment Setup & Diagnostics Utility

positional arguments:
  {check,setup,requirements}
    check               Run environment diagnostics (safe by default)
    setup               Guided setup (explicit confirmation required)
    requirements        Show scenario-based requirements and suggestions

process_data.py.snippet:
usage: process_data.py [-h] --region REGION [--resolution RESOLUTION]

Process all geophysical data for void detection

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --region REGION       Region bounds: "lon_min,lat_min,lon_max,lat_max"
  --resolution RESOLUTION
                        Output resolution in degrees (default: 0.001 = ~100m)

process_insar_data.py.snippet:
usage: process_insar_data.py [-h] [--data-dir DATA_DIR]

Process Sentinel-1 InSAR data for anomaly detection

options:
  -h, --help           show this help message and exit
  --data-dir DATA_DIR  Base data directory (default: ./data)

create_visualization.py.snippet:
usage: create_visualization.py [-h] [--output-dir OUTPUT_DIR] input_tif

Create visualizations for multi-resolution fusion outputs

positional arguments:
  input_tif             Input GeoTIFF file to visualize

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --output-dir OUTPUT_DIR

create_enhanced_visualization.py.snippet:
usage: create_enhanced_visualization.py [-h] [--region REGION]

Create enhanced visualizations of subsurface data

options:
  -h, --help       show this help message and exit
  --region REGION  Region bounds: "lon_min,lat_min,lon_max,lat_max"

env_check_safe.snippet:
osgeo.gdal   X  -
  rio_cogeo    X  -
  isce2        X  -
  mintpy       X  -
  psutil       X  -

  gdal_translate OK
  gdalbuildvrt   OK

  raw/magnetic                     OK

  processed/insar                  OK
